original_title: Sri Lanka coconut auction prices edge up
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT- Sri Lanka’s coconut auction prices edged up by 0.13 percent from a week ago at an auction on in the second week of March 2023, data showed.
The average price for 1,000 nuts grew to 82,260.58 from 82,151.06 a week earlier at the weekly auction conducted by Sri Lanka’s Coconut Development Authority on March 16.
The highest price was 90,600 rupees for 1,000 nuts up from the previous week’s 88,300 rupees, while the lowest was 70,000 down from 75,100 rupees.
The auction offered 574,807 coconuts and 416,815 nuts were sold. (Colombo/Mar 20/2023)
